name: chrome-vault-client
description: Chrome extension to store passwords in a Hashicorp Vault

scripts.sassc: sass -I node_modules src/styles/app.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer -o build/bundle.css
scripts.prebuild: shx rm -fr build && mkdir build && npm run sassc
scripts.package:chrome: shx cp src/manifest.chrome.json build/manifest.json # && google-chrome --pack-extension=build && mv build.crx vault-client.crx && mv build.pem vault-client.pem
scripts.package:firefox: shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json build/manifest.json && npm run sign && ./bin/zip-plugin.ts
scripts.package:dev: npm run build:dev && npx shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json build/manifest.json && ./bin/zip-plugin.ts
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.presign: npm run build && shx cp src/manifest.firefox.json build/manifest.json
